title: Kampuchea after Pol Pot
creator_credit: Mark Stiles, Mary Leggett and Australian Freedom From Hunger Campaign
brief_description: Shows the Kampuchean people’s will to survive and the progress they have made in rebuilding their shattered lives. Traces the operations of the Freedom from Hunger Campaign and the obstacles placed in the way by international politics. Narrated by Don Dunstan.
creator_credit_for_label: Mark Stiles, Mary Leggett and Australian Freedom From Hunger Campaign
